description: Smallest prime p such that n divides one of f(p)-1, f(p) or f(p)+1, where f(p) is product of primes <= p, or 0 if no such p exists.
references: M. R. Mudge, Smarandache Notions Journal, University of Craiova, Vol. VII, No. 1, 1996.
author: Michael R. Mudge (Amsorg(AT)aol.com)
extensions: _David W. Wilson_ points out that the published beginning is incorrect and has extended this sequence and supplied a better description.
